summary: The customer was looking for information about Contoso Wireless's product. The agent provided information about the various prepaid and postpaid plans, devices, accessories, and services that Contoso Wireless offers. When the customer inquired about the postpaid family plan, the agent explained that it includes four lines with unlimited data, talk and text as well as access to their exclusive network and customer service team. The agent also clarified that there are no additional fees associated with the family plan, aside from taxes and government-mandated fees.
